penis.transformationDescription:
Letting out an involuntary moan, [npc.name] [npc.verb(feel)] [npc.her] penis beginning to transform, and [npc.sheIs] hit by a wave of overwhelming arousal as slug like skin covers [npc.her] shaft. [npc.She] notices the tip of [npc.her] penis flare out, [npc.her] urethra starts to stretch verticaly and formes into a vaginal opaning.
[npc.She] now [npc.has] a [style.boldAlligator(slerm penis)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.penisFullDescription(true)].
[npc.She] [npc.has] [style.boldAlligator([npc.ballsCount]#IF(npc.isInternalTesticles()) internal#ENDIF balls)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.ballsFullDescription(true)], which produce [npc.cumColour(true)] [style.boldHyena(synth-cum)].
